metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12122 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Node.js: All versions prior to Node.js 6.15.0, 8.14.0, 10.14.0 and 11.3.0:Slowloris HTTP Denial of Service: An attacker can cause a Denial of Service(DoS) by sending headers very slowly keeping HTTP or HTTPS connections andassociated resources alive for a long period of time.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nodejs - 8.10.0~dfsg-2ubuntu0.4+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nodejs package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.10.0~dfsg-2ubuntu0.4+esm1').
